Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.Actors

Class ActiveActorDestructible

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.image.ImageView
com.example.demo.Actors.ActiveActor
com.example.demo.Actors.ActiveActorDestructible
All Implemented Interfaces:
Destructible, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
Direct Known Subclasses:
FighterPlane, Projectile
public abstract class ActiveActorDestructible extends ActiveActor implements Destructible
ActiveActorDestructible class represents destructible active actor in game, which is entity that can be destroyed. ActiveActorDestructible is an abstract class that extends ActiveActor and implements Destructible interface, providing common functionality for destructible actors, such as destruction management and damage handling.

    • ActiveActorDestructible

      public ActiveActorDestructible(int imageHeight, double initialXPos, double initialYPos, ComponentsFactory componentsFactory)
      Constructs new ActiveActorDestructible instance. Initialises destructible actor with its initial position and components factory.
      Parameters:
      imageHeight - : height of destructible actor's image.
      initialXPos - : initial X position of destructible actor.
      initialYPos - : initial Y position of destructible actor.
      componentsFactory - : ComponentsFactory used for components creation.
